definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: slumber;—abs. Ps 132:4, Pr 6:4; pl. [[תְּנוּמוֹת]] Pr 6:10 + 2 t.;—slumber as time of visions Job 33:15 (‖[[תַּרְדֵּמָה]]); of indolent slumber Ps 132:4 (‖[[שְׁנׇת]]) Pr 6:4 (‖[[שׁנה]]) in both c. [[נׇחַן]], sq. acc. + [[לְ]]; Pr 6:10, Pr 24:33 (both ‖[[שׁנות]], [[שׁכב]]).
